QuestData.Title: The Shadow of Doubt
QuestData.Description: A terrible manifestation of the sha has appeared to the south.$B$BIt is trying to destroy an ancient relic, the Bell of a Thousand Whispers.$B$BThis bell has never been rung in the temple's history, for it is rumored to be an ancient instrument of power.$B$BPlease go and defeat this demon where it stands! We must save this relic!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A lieutenant of the Sha of Doubt.
